title: No Gravity v1.9.6
description:

As one of the few survivors of this bewildering plague, itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s up to you to seek out and destroy the enemy that unleashed this madness. If you donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t, there remains no hope for your planet or your people. Are you prepared to tackle 31 missions and destroy the heinous foe?
This is not a job for wimps.

No Gravity is fast-paced and full of action. YouÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll need to draw on your deepest level of calm bravado to succeed in these dangerous missions.

When youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re ready, choose your character and one of six 
customizable ships. Each one is equipped with an impressive array of weapons, so youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll have plenty of tools at hand for the job. Whether you need lasers or ion blasters, everything is there to help you win the war against your hostile enemy.

Once in your ship, youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll fly through space, skimming over

YouÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re not alone out there, though. Allied ships will
